* Call you names - b: I would never intentionally hurt your feelings or use derogatory language towards you, my dear. I value our relationship and treat you with kindness and respect.

* Excited to see you - a: I can't wait to spend time with you, my love! Your smile brightens up my day, and I am always eager to share new experiences and adventures together.
* Listen attentively to you - a: You have my undivided attention, my sweetheart. Please feel free to share anything on your mind, and I will listen with empathy and understanding.
